landing.meta_description: Discover MindScan, the tool that transforms your mental well-being. Perform comprehensive psychological assessments, receive detailed analysis, and access personalized recommendations to improve your emotional and mental health. Start today.
landing.title: Your mental well-being, wherever and whenever you need it
landing.description: A place to explore your mind. Perform psychological assessments and analyze your results anytime, anywhere.

header.title: Explore your mind
header.subtitle: Follow these steps to discover everything MindScan can offer you.

steps.title: Sign up
steps.description: Quickly create your account by providing only the necessary information. Are you an individual or represent a company? Choose your profile and start your experience with MindScan.

steps.title: Sign in
steps.description: Access your account and verify your data to ensure a personalized and secure experience.

steps.title: Explore Your Options
steps.description: Free access: Try some of our most popular diagnostics and see how they work. Paid plans: Choose a plan to unlock advanced diagnostics and exclusive features like team management.

steps.title: Manage Your Team
steps.description: If you represent a company or want to work as a team, create a group, invite your teammates, and grant them access to diagnostics.

steps.title: Take Your Diagnosis
steps.description: Answer the questions honestly. Our diagnostics are designed to help you explore your psychological and emotional characteristics.

steps.title: Get Your Results
steps.description: Receive a detailed report with insights into aspects like neuroticism, emotional stability, extraversion, openness to new experiences, agreeableness, and conscientiousness. If you manage a team, you can also view your teammates' results.

final_section.text: Start your journey to better mental well-being today. We're here to support you every step of the way.
